pages.text: Paucipodia is a lobopod from the lower Cambrian period. It was a worm like creature with many pairs of tentacle like legs and a tube shaped body. It did not have any sclerites unlike some other Xenusians.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
